H0.text: Exploring alone is a behavior that students should avoid on a field trip to observe salmon spawning in a river for safety reasons.

H1.text: Listening to instructions is something students should not do for safety reasons while on a field trip to observe salmon spawning in a river.

H2.text: Take notes is an action students should not perform on a field trip to observe salmon spawning in a river for safety reasons.

H3.text: Bringing water should not be done by students on a field trip to observe salmon spawning in a river for safety reasons.
